verbose_text: This hypothesis was encouraged and supported by a previous study using a stably transformed nucleosome associated plasmids in which HSV-1 ICP4 and ICP22 were repressed by Egr-1 and Nab2 was recruited to the regulatory sequence of ICP22 intron [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ICP22 were repressed by Egr-1 and Nab2
